nodes.text: Star Wars Annual 2020 is the 2020 edition of Star Wars Annual published by Egmont Publishing. It was released in October, 2019. It features activities, posters, a Who's Who of the saga, and entries on the first eight films of the Skywalker movies.

Get ready for the last installment of the Skywalker saga with the Star Wars 2020 Annual . With activities, stories, posters and colouring, this book covers your favourite moments, characters and locations from the 40-year-old saga, plus a sneak peak from the new movie coming in December 2019.
It uses the image of a First Order med droid for probe droid.
The section on Episode VIII features a number of continuity errors, including when it states that Yoda instructed Luke Skywalker to burn down the Jedi Temple on Ahch-To.
